title: Distributed Mesh UI

detailed_design.description: Design and implement UI for visualizing and managing the distributed mesh network. Shows mesh health, node status, resource discovery, and connection management. Supports capability.distributed_mesh from roadmap.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Design mesh health dashboard. 2. Create node manager interface. 3. Add resource discovery visualization. 4. Implement connection status monitoring. 5. Connect to mesh backend API.

acceptance_criteria: Mesh health dashboard shows all nodes

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see the health of my mesh network.
As a user, I want to know which resources are available on each node.
As a power user, I want to manually route tasks to specific nodes.

technical_notes.current_issue: No UI for distributed mesh capability
